title: Embroidery, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: satin and stem stitch embroidery on taffeta
creditline: Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper
description: Red taffeta embroidered in floral design in polychrome silks, and gold and silver wound on silk cord. Satin and stem stitches.
